title: Calories in 100g Watermelon
meta_description: Discover calories in 100gm watermelon, including carbs, sugars, hydration benefits, full nutrition breakdown per 100g, and simple tweaks for recipes.

quick_answer.text: 100g of watermelon provides about 30 kcal, mostly from natural sugars, with high water content for hydration.

faqs.a: Approximately 30 kcal per 100g of fresh watermelon.
Yes, about 7.6g carbs per 100g, mostly natural sugars with 0.4g fiber.

faqs.q: Does watermelon have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Very little: 0.6g protein and 0.2g fat per 100g.

faqs.q: What's the sugar content in 100gm watermelon?
How does preparation affect calories in watermelon?
faqs.a: Raw is lowest; blending into juice or adding sweeteners increases calories slightly.
